Company: New York State Office of the State Comptroller
Description of incident: A retiree discovered a web page with a list of retirees who had requested a copy of their 1099R tax form.  Names, Social Security numbers, phone numbers and retirement numbers were on the page.  The entire web page and the "tax calculator" feature which the retiree had used to find the information were removed from the website when the Office became aware of the incident.
